titleDetails.name: getLogsByDateRange
titleDetails.description: Get logs by agency ID and date range

content.req: curl --location 'http://govqueue-api.onrender.com/logs/daterange/?agencyId=10&startDate=09%2F04%2F2023&endDate=09%2F05%2F2023'
curl --location 'http://govqueue-api.onrender.com/queues/19'
curl --location 'http://govqueue-api.onrender.com/queues/agency/5'
curl --location 'http://govqueue-api.onrender.com/queues/add' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{ "agencyId": "1", "name": "Window 3" }'
curl --location 'http://govqueue-api.onrender.com/users/1'
